name: Endless Turns
description:
Endless Turns is a game with a very simple and easy to understand gameplay, in addition, you simply use a key to play it.
Despite being something simple, it is a very difficult game to play and get great scores

HOW TO PLAY:
Click at the right moment to make the ball turn to next path. If you make a mistake you will lose, your progress will be lost and your score will be saved if it is higher than the one already saved.

In addition, you can collect coins during the game, which are something more to get apart from achieving a higher score.

SOME FEATURES:

- Compleatly endless game

- Very easy to understand gameplay

- Retro style

- Addictive game, you can try to improve your scores.
